InstructionData.Title: Pressure Relief with Toxin Detection
InstructionData.Author: onebit
InstructionData.Instructions:
# Pressure Relief # PR-AV-100 # https://github.com/dtandersen/stationeers-library alias Sensor d0 alias Vent d1 alias pressure r1 alias active r2 #alias overpressure r3 alias ratio r4 #alias toxic r5
define setpoint 100 define pipepressure 45000 define maxpollutant 0.005 define maxvolatiles 0.005
main: s Vent Mode 1 # inward s Vent PressureInternal pipepressure s Vent PressureExternal 0
loop: yield l ratio Sensor RatioVolatiles bgt ratio maxvolatiles toxic
l ratio Sensor RatioPollutant s db Setting ratio bgt ratio maxpollutant toxic
l pressure Sensor Pressure bgt pressure setpoint overpressure
s Vent On 0 j loop
toxic: s Vent PressureExternal 0 j on
overpressure: s Vent PressureExternal setpoint #s db Setting 999 on: s Vent On 1 j loop
